entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Conversion operator clashes with the explicit impls #65685
    17.5
  • Intellisense switch expression produces invalid code from `not` pattern #65683
  • Pattern matching over generic requires C# 8.0 instead of C# 7.1 #65682
    Backlog
  • Add tests for incremental member edit analysis #65678

Closed

  • Code Analysis constantly crashes (IndexOutOfRangeException) #64266
    17.4
  • NotNull annotation warning for parameter even though it's checked for null #65684
  • Fully-Qualify fixer serializes symbols as part of normal processsing. #65652
  • C# compiler does not provide a warning about unused lambda variables #22921
    Backlog
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class does not generate default values for parameters of member/constructor/operator. #65638

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify and clarify code around diagnostic modes. #65689
    Area-IDE
  • Add option to enable/disable document outline and disable by default #65688
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #65687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Fix incorrect duplicate conversion #65686
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Move IDS_XXX checks out of the parser. #65679
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Find refs - Remove bogus assert and add test #65675
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • [Infra] Merge main to release/dev17.5 #65673
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.5 to main #65666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65667
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65657
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add feature flag to allow diagnostic tagging to be either push or pull. #65671
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Don't throw when changed member is not a method member #65676
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Revert "Merge pull request #63858 from CyrusNajmabadi/pullDiags" #65538
    Area-IDE, OnDeckForServicing
  • View Call Hierarchy - fix thread block (#65452) #65574
    Area-IDE
  • Port #65083 to release/dev17.4 branch #65576
    Area-Analyzers, OnDeckForServicing
  • Do all work for the 'fully qualify' fixer out of process. #65665
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [Infra] 17.5 P2 snap #65674
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #65677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #65672
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix generation of parameter symbols with explicit default values #65639
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move SRM to 6.0.1 #65416
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65691
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move IDS_FeatureXXX checks out of the parser #65587
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix stale inline diagnostics #65571
    Area-IDE
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
  • Allow optional and `params` parameters in synthesized delegate templates #65582
    Area-Compilers
  • Consider delegate default parameter values and `params` in symbol matcher #65579
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure proper receiver value is used for a constrained call invocation #65642
    Area-Compilers
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #65606
    Area-Compilers
  • Cleanup keyword recommender tests #65664
    Area-IDE, Community
